cast.original_title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
cast.overview: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.
cast.title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf

details.biography: Samia Mounts is an American voice actor for the English dub of the Pokémon anime. Mounts graduated from the Boston Conservatory and became an actor and singer as an adult. Samia joined the Pokémon anime during Pokémon the Series: Black & White, most notably voicing the Douse Drive Genesect in the sixteenth movie. After Pokémon, Samia went on to voice roles in other works.
details.name: Samia Mounts
